metadata.name: BitStake
metadata.description:
BitStake NFT is issued by BitStake Toke. It is not only a work of art with huge appreciation potential, it is also a financial asset that add rebates to its life and nature loving holders.

The first premium edition of BitStake NFT has a unique collection of 500 whale designs. Contains eastern and western art elements, zodiac themes, a touch of Marvel’s, cute cartoon drawings...

The design team is composed of Hong Kong and several international painters, who have won various awards in international art competitions. They have given the souls to their creation, to these whale images, and hope everyone of us can become a “big whale” with big wealth!
